description: Smartwool partnered with Smartwool athlete Chris Benchetler to combine his art with their Merino wool ski socks. their PhD® Ski Light Elite Homechetler Print features their Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability; their 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit; and their Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced in-boot comfort. They are designed with a wider welt to help ensure all-day comfort, targeted cushioning around the toe, heel, and shin, and body-mapped mesh zones help keep things breathable. With all of this power-packed into one pair of ski socks, you just might have your best season to date.
name: Smartwool PhD Ski Targeted Cushion Homechetler Print Socks - Mens
